sidebarTitle: ðŸ”— Quick Links
---
A [Virtual Machine (VM)](learn/virtual-machines) is a blueprint for a blockchain. VMs can define anything you want, but will generally define transactions that are executed and how blocks are created.

## ðŸ”— Virtual Machines Quick Links

| Title                                                                                   | Description                                                                                                                                                             |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [Introduction to VMs](build/virtual-machines/introduction-vms)                          | Introductory document to Virtual Machine Development, including some simple tutorials. This document is a Prerequisite for most of the other virtual machine tutorials. |
| [Create a VM in Any Language](build/virtual-machines/simple-vm-any-language)            | A language-agnostic, high-level doc explaining the basics of how to get started at implementing your own virtual machine from scratch.                                  |
| [Create a Simple VM in Golang](build/virtual-machines/golang-vms/simple-golang-vm)      | Learn how to build a simple virtual machine on Avalanche using Golang.                                                                                                  |
| [Create a Complex VM in Golang](build/virtual-machines/golang-vms/complex-golang-vm)    | Learn how to build a complex virtual machine on Avalanche using Golang.                                                                                                 |
| [Create a Rust VM](build/virtual-machines/rust-vms/setting-up-environment)              | Learn how to develop virtual machines on Avalanche using Rust.                                                                                                          |
| [Generate a Stateful Precompile](build/virtual-machines/evm-customization/introduction) | Create a stateful precompiles for Subnet-EVM from scratch.                                                                                                              |
| [HyperSDK](https://github.com/ava-labs/hypersdk#readme)                                 | An opinionated framework for building hyper-scalable blockchains on Avalanche. This is an external link to HyperSDK's GitHub documentation and repository.              |
